snippet: A complaint filed by the National Labor Relations Board says employees in several states were disciplined or fired after striking for better pay.
abstract: Sweeping complaint filed by National Labor Relations Board says Walmart illegally disciplined or fired employees after strikes and protests for better pay; complaint lists violations of federal law in 14 states involving more than 60 workers and 34 stores.
lead_paragraph: A complaint filed by the National Labor Relations Board says employees in several states were disciplined or fired after striking for better pay.

headline.main: Walmart Is Facing Claims That It Fired Protesters
headline.print_headline: Walmart Is Facing Claims That It Fired Protesters
